title: Hyundai Offers Killer 2026 Santa Fe Lease Deal for August
description: The 2026 Hyundai Santa Fe looks like the South Korean brand took a 2016 Land Rover LR4 and created its own, fresher, and more attractive version. Fully redesigned last year, the Santa Fe departs completely from its sleeker predecessor in favor of a more upright and boxy look. With sharply defined ...
titleSummary: "Steal of the Summer: Hyundai Drops Jaw-Dropping Santa Fe Lease Price"
descriptionSummary: The 2026 Hyundai Santa Fe embodies a bold new identity, shedding its sleek predecessor for a chunkier, more rugged design that diverges significantly from the curves of its predecessors.

title: Federal jury finds Tesla partly liable for fatal Autopilot crash
description: A jury in Miami has determined that Tesla should be held partly liable for a fatal 2019 crash involving the automaker's "Autopilot" driver-assist system, and is requiring Tesla to pay $329 million in damages to the family of the deceased and an injured survivor, multiple news outlets reported ...
titleSummary: "Tesla's Self-Drive Tech Blamed in Deadly Crash Verdict Shocks Industry and Investors"
descriptionSummary: A Miami jury has ruled that Tesla bears responsibility for a devastating 2019 car crash, which claimed one life and left another seriously injured. The company will owe nearly $330 million in compensation.

title: Ferrari shares dip 12% in biggest decline since 2016 listing
description: Ferrari shares fell more than 12% on Thursday, the biggest single-day drop since the automaker was first publicly listed on stock exchanges in New York and Milan in 2016, Reuters reports. Yet unlike some automakers, Ferrari is maintaining its financial guidance amid uncertainty over the Trump ...
titleSummary: "Ferrari Stock Sinks to Two-Year Low in Sharpest Decline Yet"
descriptionSummary: Ferrari's shares plummeted nearly 12% on Thursday, marking the largest one-day decline since its IPO in 2016. Despite market volatility, the luxury carmaker has reaffirmed its financial projections despite ongoing uncertainty surrounding global trade policies.

title: Kia’s Carnival, Sportage, And Telluride Set New Sales Records In July
description: Kia’s positive sales momentum continued into the second half of 2025, with the manufacturer reporting a 12% increase in year-on-year sales in July. Together with Hyundai, the Korean brands had a stellar end to the second quarter, while Kia’s sedans are seeing sales growth that’s outpacing its SUVs. ...
titleSummary: Kia's SUV Trio Shatters Sales Marks in Record-Breaking July Performance
descriptionSummary: Kia's upward trend shows no signs of slowing down, with July 2025 sales marking a 12% boost over last year. The Korean brand's sedan sales are outshining its SUVs, driving a successful second quarter alongside Hyundai.

title: Porsche's New Combustion Crossover Will Arrive Within Three Years
description: Despite achieving record sales in the U.S. earlier this year, Porsche is struggling in certain respects. Sales in China are falling as far cheaper locally produced luxury EVs with more power continue to eat into sales, and with tariffs taking another bite out of the bottom line, forcing Porsche to ...
titleSummary: "Porsche Revs Up Electric-Free Lineup with Fuel-Powered Hybrid SUV Coming 2025"
descriptionSummary: Porsche's success story in the US market has been tempered by struggles elsewhere. In China, the company is facing a decline in sales as more affordable local electric vehicles gain traction, while tariffs are further eroding profits.

title: Aston Martin May Sell Stake in Formula 1 Racing Team and Go Private in Turnaround Efforts
description: Despite coming up with some compelling vehicles in recent years, Aston Martin has continued to struggle financially, leading it to some tough decisions as it plots a path forward. Among other efforts, the storied British automaker reportedly plans to sell its stake in its Formula 1 racing team, and ...
titleSummary: Aston Martin to Ditch Public Face as Part of High-Stakes Formula One Revamp Plan
descriptionSummary: Aston Martin's financial struggles have led to a critical reassessment of its priorities, with key moves underway to secure the company's future. This includes potentially divesting from its high-profile Formula 1 racing partnership.

title: Jaguar Land Rover CEO Adrian Mardell steps down
description: Jaguar Land Rover CEO Adrian Mardell is stepping down after 35 years at the automaker, including the last three as CEO. Mardell's tenure brought increased profits to JLR, and he started a major restructuring of the automaker's brands and model lineups that's still underway. "Adrian Mardell has ...
titleSummary: "Jaguar Land Rover Leader Steps Down Amid Leadership Shake-Up"
descriptionSummary: After a storied 35-year career with Jaguar Land Rover, including three years as CEO, Adrian Mardell is handing over the reins to a new leader. His legacy includes driving profits upward and launching a transformative brand overhaul.

title: Ford Begins August With Another Massive Safety Recall For Its Most Popular Vehicles
description: It's a new month, but the same old problems for Ford. The automaker has issued an average of one recall every two days in the first half of 2025, breaking an infamous GM recall record, and as we get deeper into the second half of the year, the problems keep coming. As first reported by Reuters, the ...
titleSummary: Ford's Top-Selling Models Hit By Yet Another Major Safety Alert in August
descriptionSummary: Ford's struggles persist despite a new month. With a staggering average of one recall every two days in the first six months of 2025, the company is poised to break its own record for recalls this year.

title: 2026 Toyota Grand Highlander Barely Costs More Than Last Year
description: The RAV4 is the world's best-selling car, as well as America's most popular Toyota, but in second place is the Grand Highlander, a spacious three-row SUV that will soon be joined by an all-electric Highlander little brother. In the meantime, Toyota is ensuring that the 2026 Grand Highlander will ...
titleSummary: "New Toyota Grand Highlander Arrives with Slight Price Hike for 2026 Model"
descriptionSummary: The RAV4 reigns supreme, but its sibling, the Grand Highlander, is quickly gaining traction as America's favorite Toyota, offering ample space for families in a versatile three-row SUV format, with an electric model on the horizon.

title: Tesla Will Love China Rival BYD’s Struggles to Expand in Key Market
description: Tesla opened its first Indian showroom earlier this month, and the automaker appears to have an opportunity to make up lost ground against Chinese rival BYD in the country’s challenging but substantial market. BYD, and many other Chinese companies, have been unable to obtain visas for executives to ...
titleSummary: "BYD's Bid for Electric Supremacy Hits Speed Bumps in Crucial Chinese Arena"
descriptionSummary: Tesla has entered India's competitive auto market with its first showroom, a move that could potentially allow the company to regain footing ahead of Chinese competitor BYD, which has faced difficulties in securing executive visas locally.

title: Indiana’s New Blackout License Plates Are a Perfect Match for Blacked-Out Cars
description: For many people, a license plate is nothing more than a legal requirement and one of the formalities when acquiring a new car. It’s a bit more than that for enthusiasts, since the license plate type—and even the number of plates on your car—has quite an impact on the aesthetics. Recently, a ...
titleSummary: "Blacked-Out Plates Mirror Trend of Darkened Rides in Hoosier State"
descriptionSummary: For many drivers, a license plate is just a necessity, but for car enthusiasts, it's a design element that can greatly enhance or detract from their vehicle's overall look. A seemingly minor detail with a significant visual impact.

title: New Mitsubishi Outlander Trail Edition Takes Aim At Toyota's RAV4 Woodland
description: Mitsubishi has just announced the debut of the first-ever Trail Edition of the 2025 Outlander, based on the regular Outlander SE. Think of it as Mitsubishi’s alternative to Honda’s TrailSport, Toyota's RAV4 Woodland, or Subaru’s Wilderness models, although as we’ll see, the Outlander Trail Edition ...
titleSummary: Mitsubishi Fires Back at Toyota with Trail-Ready Outlander Model
descriptionSummary: Mitsubishi has unveiled a new twist on its 2025 Outlander: the Trail Edition, a rugged take on the SE model. It joins a growing lineup of off-road-focused crossovers from other manufacturers.

title: Ford CEO Hints At Revenge Lap After Corvette Nürburgring Record
description: Team Chevrolet is still basking in the glory of setting a new record for American cars around the Nürburgring. Both the Corvette ZR1 and ZR1X finished the 12.9-mile lap in under seven minutes, and in doing so, both these Corvettes shattered the American record held by the Ford Mustang GTD. ...
titleSummary: Ford Fires Back at Corvette with Plans for Speed Reignition
descriptionSummary: Chevrolet's performance team is riding high after setting a new benchmark for American cars on the iconic Nürburgring circuit. A blisteringly fast lap time earned both Corvette ZR1 and ZR1X a coveted spot atop the leaderboard, outpacing their archrival, the Ford Mustang GTD.

title: Next-Gen Volkswagen ID.4 Has the Tesla Model Y In Its Sights
description: Reception for the Volkswagen ID.4 is probably best classified as “lukewarm.” While not a bad electric vehicle, it stumbles at some key checkpoints. It doesn’t scratch that 300 miles of range itch, and its most powerful variant touts a 335-horsepower dual-motor setup that is decidedly middle of the ...
titleSummary: Volkswagen's Electric Game-Changer Aims to Overtake Tesla in the Crossover Market
descriptionSummary: The Volkswagen ID.4 has received a mixed reaction from critics, with several key areas falling short of expectations. Its electric range is below par, while its top-tier model's dual-motor performance is unremarkably average.

title: BMW M3 CS Touring Sets Nürburgring Record, Becomes Fastest Wagon Ever
description: While most automakers are busy inflating crossovers with mood lighting and pretending it’s performance, BMW has done something that actually matters. It turned a family wagon into a track-dominating monster. The new BMW M3 CS Touring is now officially the fastest production ...
titleSummary: "German Horsepower Reigns Supreme as Wagon Breaks Lap Time Record at Nurburgring"
descriptionSummary: Behind the trend of crossover pampering, BMW bucks convention with a refreshingly practical approach: transforming a humble family hauler into a high-performance beast that defies expectations and sets new speed records.

title: Batmobile Replica For Sale Lets You Live Your Gotham Fantasies
description: Batman and Gotham City may be fictional DC Comics creations, but that doesn't mean you can't live out your superhero fantasies with a Batmobile of your own. This particular one is for sale on Exotic Car Trader, and you can check out the listing by clicking here. This Batmobile is built on the ...
titleSummary: "Drive into the Shadows: 1-of-a-Kind Batmobile Replica for the Ultimate Fan"
descriptionSummary: Get ready to unleash your inner caped crusader with this bespoke Batmobile replica, now available for purchase through a reputable online marketplace. Built on a unique platform, it's a sleek and powerful ride that's sure to turn heads.

title: Skipping Over-The-Air Updates For Your Car Could Be A Costly Mistake
description: Over-the-air updates have drastically changed how we interact with our cars. Not only can existing features be improved over time, but software updates can add all-new features or even resolve a recall-related fault, eliminating the need for you to waste time by visiting a dealer. But as with most ...
titleSummary: "Ignoring Vehicle Software Upgrades Can Leave You With A Hefty Repair Bill"
descriptionSummary: With modern vehicles, on-the-go software upgrades have revolutionized the driving experience. Features are enhanced and new ones added, while issues like recalls can be resolved remotely, saving you the hassle of dealership visits.

title: Lexus is Set To Cut Long-Running Models Within the Next Year
description: Lexus hasn’t initiated a significant change in its catalog in quite some time, but that familiarity is part of what draws people to the brand. The Japanese automaker is getting ready for a major shakeup, however, and is expected to discontinue several models in the coming months. The long-running ...
titleSummary: Lexus to Axe Aging Lineup in Major Model Purge by 2024
descriptionSummary: Lexus has been synonymous with consistency, but that stability may be about to give way to significant change as the Japanese marque prepares to retire several longtime models from its lineup in the near future.

title: Volkswagen Golf GTI will stay 'into the 2030s,' brand CEO says
description: The Volkswagen Golf GTI may have lost its manual transmission, but VW has no immediate plans to do away with the iconic hot hatchback itself even as it moves ahead with all-electric alternatives, according to brand CEO Thomas Schäfer. In a recent interview with VW enthusiast Jamie Orr, Schäfer said ...
titleSummary: Volkswagen's Iconic Hot Hatch Lives on Through Decade Mark
descriptionSummary: Volkswagen's iconic Golf GTI remains firmly on the agenda, despite the loss of its manual transmission and a shift towards electric models. Brand chief Thomas Schäfer says there are no plans to axe the hot hatch just yet.

title: Recall: Lincoln Aviator rear windows may fail to reverse direction
description: Ford is recalling 2025 Lincoln Aviator SUVs because the reversing mechanisms on their side rear windows may not kick in quickly enough to prevent trapped fingers. Federal regulations stipulate that power windows must automatically reverse when encountering an object, but in this case they "may ...
titleSummary: Lincoln Recalls Luxury SUV Over Faulty Rear Window Reversing Mechanism Flaw
descriptionSummary: Lincoln is issuing a recall for certain 2025 Aviator SUV models due to a potential issue with the automatic reversing feature of their side rear windows. This may lead to trapped fingers if not activated promptly enough.

title: Toyota Is Making The Highlander Electric Because The Grand Highlander Is Too Popular
description: After the unbeatable RAV4, once again the best-selling vehicle in the world, Toyota's best-selling SUVs bear the name Highlander or Grand Highlander. But most buyers prefer the latter, larger option, and that's a bad look for the former. Indeed, Toyota has announced that it will consolidate ...
titleSummary: "Electrifying Demand for Grand Highlander Spurs Toyota to Launch Hybrid Highlander"
descriptionSummary: Despite its record-breaking predecessor, the RAV4, Toyota's Highlander and Grand Highlander models have seen the latter's popularity outshine the former - an unflattering trend for the smaller SUV, which is now facing a consolidation plan from its manufacturer.

title: Subaru Won't Like Hyundai's Interior and Passenger Space
description: Subaru, believe it or not, has been in the 3-row SUV game for a while now. The first 3-row SUV was the Acura MDX in 2000, and then the Subaru B9 Tribeca debuted in 2006. So, in true Subaru fashion, they were a little late to the party. Despite its incredibly loyal fanbase during the time, the ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai Steals the Crown with Roomy Interiors that Leave Subaru in the Dust"
descriptionSummary: Subaru's entry into the three-row SUV market was slightly delayed, but not by design. The brand waited until 2006 to unveil the B9 Tribeca, nearly six years after Acura's pioneering MDX model debuted in 2000.

title: Stellantis Is Recalling Over 121,000 Jeep Grand Cherokees, Find Out Why
description: According to new documents released by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA), the federal agency within the Department of Transportation responsible for automotive safety, Stellantis, the parent company behind storied American brands like Chrysler, Dodge, Jeep, and Ram, is ...
titleSummary: "Jeep Recall Hits 120,000 Units, Safety Concerns Prompt Mass Vehicle Call-Back"
descriptionSummary: Recent data from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration reveals that Stellantis, the multinational corporation encompassing iconic American car brands such as Chrysler, Dodge, Jeep, and Ram, has faced scrutiny over automotive safety concerns.

title: Hyundai Praises “Historic” Trade Deal Between South Korea and Trump Admin
description: South Korean automaker Hyundai is praising the Trump Administration and the government of its home nation for reaching a trade agreement that would allow the Hyundai, Kia, and Genesis brands to continue their U.S. investments and business strategy. On July 31, Seoul time, U.S. President Donald ...
titleSummary: "South Korea Lands Major Trade Victory with US in Groundbreaking Agreement"
descriptionSummary: Hyundai Motor Group praises the US and South Korean governments for negotiating a trade deal that ensures continued investment in American operations by its Hyundai, Kia, and Genesis brands, bolstering their long-term business plans.

title: A Surprising Number of Drivers Are Underwater on New-Vehicle Trade-Ins
description: Shocking Q2 data has revealed that one in four new vehicle trade-ins had negative equity, a four-year high since Q1 2021, when 31.9% of new trade-ins were upside down. Edmunds’ report states that 26.6% of trade-ins toward new-car purchases in Q2 were worth less than what a driver owed, up from ...
titleSummary: "Trade-In Traps: Thousands Stuck with Debt as New Cars Lose Value"
descriptionSummary: A stark trend has emerged from the latest Q2 data: nearly one quarter of traded-in vehicles had negative equity, reaching its highest point since early 2021. This surge has left many drivers with significant debt on new purchases.

title: Mercedes-Benz Declares War on Counterfeit Auto Parts
description: If you have ever had a car repaired at a dealer, you would know that getting it fixed there is an incredibly expensive endeavour, and for a good reason: genuine car parts aren’t cheap. No matter the part, whether it's a replacement body panel or an oil or air filter, the premium of having an OEM ...
titleSummary: "Benz Battles Fakes with Tough New Anti-Counterfeiting Campaign"
descriptionSummary: Dealing with dealership repairs can be pricey due to the high cost of authentic auto components. Even simple replacements like air filters or body panels come at a steep price, making DIY fixes a more attractive option for many car owners.

title: The 2026 Toyota Corolla Cross Gets Facelifted to Finally Look Interesting
description: The Corolla Cross is a pretty big hit for the brand, and sales in 2024 were hot. Okay, so not exactly RAV4 hot (the best-selling crossover in America), but just over 93,000 units for the year is a huge jump from 64,000 sold in 2023. That number constitutes both the gas-only Corolla Cross and the ...
titleSummary: "Toyota Corolla Cross Overhaul Brings Sizzle to a Familiar Face"
descriptionSummary: The Corolla Cross has proven to be a massive success for Toyota, with sales skyrocketing by nearly 45% in 2024, reaching over 93,000 units – a significant increase from 64,000 just the previous year.

title: The 5 Most Expensive States for Car Insurance in 2025
description: The cost of car insurance rose 42% from $1,633 to $2,313 between 2022 and 2024, and drivers can expect more increases during 2025. Insurify projected that U.S. drivers would incur an overall average car insurance premium increase of 5% (to $2,435), with some states worse off than others. Florida ...
titleSummary: "Costly Cruisers: Top 5 US States with Sky-High Auto Insurance Rates Coming Soon"
descriptionSummary: Car insurance costs surged 42% from 2022 to 2024, jumping from $1,633 to $2,313. Insurify forecasts a 5% hike in 2025, with US drivers facing an average premium of $2,435 and varying degrees of increase across states.

title: Monterey Car Week Will Rumble To The Sound Of A New Shelby American Mustang
description: Shelby American is teasing the reveal of a new Mustang-based creation with a short caption on social media noting that "Carroll Shelby's favorite car was always 'the next one.'" Well, the next one is on its way after the tuning company revealed its own idea of an S650 with a GT350 badge back in ...
titleSummary: "New Muscle Arrives in Monterey as Shelby's Latest Stunner Hits the Road"
descriptionSummary: Shelby American is gearing up to unveil a brand-new Mustang-inspired creation, hinting that innovation has always been at the heart of their approach. The next chapter in their legacy is finally here, and it promises to be just as thrilling as its predecessors.

title: Ford blames tariffs for profit slump, says Japanese automakers have an advantage
description: Ford joined the list of automakers reporting dour financial results due to President Donald Trump's tariffs. In an earnings call Wednesday, CEO Jim Farley said the automaker was expecting a $2 billion tariff bill, and went on to claim in a separate interview that the Trump Administration's policies ...
titleSummary: "Tariff Hit Knocks Ford's Bottom Line, as Foreign Rivals Profit from Advantage"
descriptionSummary: Ford's latest earnings report reflects the negative impact of President Trump's tariffs. CEO Jim Farley disclosed a projected $2 billion tariff expense, citing the administration's trade policies as a major contributor to the automaker's financial strain.
